body.p:
Louisville July 25th 1863
His Excellency
Govr Robinson
My fellow citizen James H Stephens has a son in the Penitentiary he has served more than half his term and his father wishes him to Join the Army
Mr Stephens the father is a good & true man, devoted to the Union, an exemplary citizen and I hope you may consider the case as deserving Executive clemency, the boy was led away by bad company
